Introduction

Walking After U (워킹 애프터 유) is a South Korean girl band that currently consists of four members: Sunny, A-Zzang, Haein and Hangyeom. They were formed from the merger of two other bands (Rubber Duckie and Swingz) and made their official debut on September 19, 2014 under LODIS Company.
